com.camerontec.catalys.mis.eps.jmx

Class EscalationLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.mis.eps.jmx.EscalationLevel

  • public class EscalationLevel
extends Object
    Represents the configuration of an individual escalation level within an EscalationPath.

    Has a list of actions that will be performed by this escalation level.

    Also has a list of onAck actions that will be performed if the event is acknowledged while this escalation level is being executed, and a list of onClose actions that will be performed if the event is closed while this escalation level is being executed.

    In addition, this object has two boolean flags isStopHereOnAck() and isStopHereOnClose() that are used to indicate whether or not the execution of the escalation path's actions should stop if it is acknowledged or closed (respectively) at this escalation level.
